Text:
Will you also upload disc 2? 
Thanks

@RedLady1: Thanks for (re)uploading the complete second series. Glad the suggestion for DVDFab worked out so well.
Wish you a merry christmas and a wonderfull 2011!
P.S. Redlady1: The seeding is rather poor. Could and would you please seed a little extra until there is enough ammunition to bring your torrents to full life? Thanks!

@RedLady1: This download works fine; but ... my media player does not handle the files well; only part one is showed; on the pc it works fine; now I want to burn the files to a dvd with nero but this dvd cannot be played on my dvd-player; can you help

@bramkolk: Bij mij gaat alles prima, ook op de DVD-speler. Heb je de combinatie DVD-Shrink en DVD-Decrypter al geprobeerd? Beide programma's zijn als freeware te downloaden, eventueel via www.videohelp.com.

Bedankt!
Heb net serie I gezien, en vond het heel erg goed, dus heb erg veel zin in II :-)
